Game: Shrek's Carnival Craze- Party Games 2008-10-28T00:00:00-07:00 The twisted fairytale humor of Shrek meets the fun of the renaissance midway in Shrek's Carnival Craze. This game includes 28 hilarious carnival mini-games.
